prodNameC: 凡立沙基因重組抗核抗體篩檢試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Microplate Strips (coated with nuclear antigens: dsDNA, RNP(68 kDa,A,C), Sm(B,B’,D), SS-A/Ro(52 kDa, 60 kDa), SS-B/La, Scl-70, Centromere and Jo-1)
Calibrator (containing BSA, sodium azide, detergent and human serum)
Negative Control (containing BSA, sodium azide, detergent and human serum)
Wash Buffer Concentrate (PBS concentrate containing sodium azide and detergent)
Sample Diluent (PBS containing BSA, 0.095%(w/v) sodium azide and dtergent)
IgG HRP Conjugate (anti-human IgG HRP (horse-radish peroxidase) conjugate)
Substrate TMB
Stop Solution (0.5 M H2SO4)
applicantName: 台灣法迪亞股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市內湖區洲子街85號6樓之1
efficacy: 在人體血清或血漿中，做8種抗核抗體[抗 dsDNA、RNP (68 kDa, A, C), Sm (B, B', D)、SS-A/Ro (52 kDa, 60 kDa)、SS-B/La、Scl-70、著絲點以及Jo-1的抗體] 的定性分析。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學用裝置
